property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hunt for Gollum - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: The Quest Deck has been modified for Nightmare Mode. Flip this card over and keep it next to the quest deck. Its effect remains active throughout the game, which is now ready to begin.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hunt for Gollum - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Forced: At the end of the refresh phase, choose an unclaimed Clue card not attached to a Mordor enemy and attach it to a Mordor enemy, if able. (If it was guarded, detach the encounter guarding if first. The newly attached Mordor enemy is now guarding it.)
If at any point there are four or more Clue cards attached to Mordor enemies, the players lose the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hunt for Gollum - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: When a card effect instructs a player to "look" at cards in the encounter deck and Ravenous Hawk is among those cards, that player must put Ravenous Hawk into play engaged with him. (This does not satisfy the Forced effect of stage 1B or 2B).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hunt for Gollum - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Mordor.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: At the beginning of the refresh phase, if Hunting Warg entered play this round, search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Hunters from Morder and add it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hunt for Gollum - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Forest. Road.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each player who does not control at least 1 Clue card cannot draw cards through card effects.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If you do not control at least 1 Clue card, discard all cards from your hand.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hunt for Gollum - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: Each Mordor enemy with at least 1 Clue card attached gets +2 Ú.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Ú for each Clue card in play until the end of the round.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hunt for Gollum - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
Progress cannot be placed on Dark Pools while it is in the staging area.
Forced: After Dark Pools becomes the active location, each player must discard an ally with the highest printed cost among the allies he controls.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hunt for Gollum - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Search the encounter discard pile for a Clue card and attach it to a Mordor enemy in play, if able. If no card is attached by this effect, The Enemy's Trail gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Search the encounter discard pile for a Clue card and attach it to a Mordor enemy in play, if able.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hunt for Gollum - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player chooses a Clue card attached to a hero and attaches it to a Mordor enemy in play, if able.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Damage from this attack must be applied to a hero you control with a Clue card attached, if able.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hunt for Gollum - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: Attach to the active location and remove all progress from that location. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per location. Attached location contributes its $ during the quest phase as if it were in the staging area.")
If The Trail Goes Cold does not attach to a location as a result of its effect, it gains surge.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: The Quest Deck has been modified for Nightmare Mode. Flip this card over and keep it next to the quest deck. Its effect remains active throughout the game, which is now ready to begin.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Stage 1A should read, "Remove 5 unique Troll cards" instead of 4.
Stage 2B should read, "When Revealed: Place Louis, Morris, Rupert and Stuart into the staging area."
Forced: At the end of the quest phase, if no progress was placed on the current quest this phase, place 1 progress on the current quest (bypassing the active location).
Response: After defeating a unique Troll enemy, you may choose and discard 1 "Sacked!" card from play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: While Savage Hill-troll is in the victory display, each Troll enemy gets +1 hit point.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Troll, defending character does not ready during the refresh phase this round.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Rob & Bob makes its first attack each round, if there are two or more players, it engages the next player and makes an additional attack (discard and deal a new shadow card for this attack).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: After Louis attacks, the defending player must raise his threat by 3.
While Louis is in the victory display, each Troll enemy gains, "Forced: After this enemy attacks, the defending player must raise his threat by 1."

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
Immune to player events.
While Morris is in the victory display, each Troll enemy gets +1 Û and gains "Immune to player events."

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
Rupert's Ú cannot be reduced.
While Rupert is in the victory display, the Ú of each Troll enemy cannot be reduced.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
Cannot have player attachments.
While Stuart is in the victory display, each Troll enemy gets +1 Ú and gains "Cannot have player attachments."

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: While Troll Lair is in the staging area, players cannot reduce their threat.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If attacking enemy is a Troll, remove 4 damage tokens from it.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After any amount of progress is placed on Hives and Hives, deal 1 damage to each character in play.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +2 Û.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The first player chooses a hero in any player's discard pile and removes that hero from the game. Then, heal all damage from each Troll enemy in play. If no damage is removed from any Troll enemy as a result of this effect, Time for Supper gains surge.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Add Rob & Bob to the staging area. Then, each player must search the encounter deck and discard pile for a non-unique Troll enemy and add it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Conflict at the Carrock - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Rob & Bob have been defeated, the players have rescued Grimbeorn the Old from certain death, and have won the game.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: The Quest Deck has been modified for Nightmare Mode. Flip this card over and keep it next to the quest deck. Its effect remains active throughout the game, which is now ready to begin.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Setup: Search the encounter deck for 1 copy of Goblin Eagle-hunter and add it to the staging area. Then shuffle the encounter deck.
Forced: The first Creature enemy revealed during each quest phase gains surge.
Response: After an Athelas card is placed in the discard pile, you may shuffle it into the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Goblin. Orc.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Goblin Eagle-hunter gets +1 hit point per player.
Forced: At the end of the combat phase, deal 1 damage to Wilyador.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If Wilyador has 10 or less damage on him, deal 2 damage to Wilyador.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Spider.

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Treetop Bird-eater is engaged with a player, characters controlled by that player cannot be healed.
Forced: At the beginning of the encounter phase, Treetop Bird-eater engages the player who controls Wilyador (regardless of threat).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: Dark-wood Grove gets +1 $ and +1 quest point for each Athelas card in play.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: If defending player controls at least 1 Athelas card, attacking enemy makes an additional attack after this one.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: While Labyrinthine Woods is in the staging area, Creature enemies get +1 $ and +1 Û.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: After this attack, attacking enemy engages the next player and makes an additional attack.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: While Pitch-dark Thicket is the active location, all characters lose the ranged keyword.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy cannot be attacked by characters with the ranged keyword until the end of the phase.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to an Eagle character. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per character. Attached character loses the Eagle trait, and takes 1 damage each time it readies.")

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Resolve the "when revealed" effect of Shot from the Sky.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: A Journey to Rhosgobel - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach to Wilyador. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "Forced: When attached character is healed by a card effect other than Athelas, the amount of damage healed is reduced to 1. Then, discard Noxious Supplies.")

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: The Quest Deck has been modified for Nightmare Mode. Flip this card over and keep it next to the quest deck. Its effect remains active throughout the game, which is now ready to begin.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
No more than 1 progress may be placed on each location in the staging area each round.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
Forced: After the players travel to a location, Tunneling Nameless Thing engages the first player.
If there is no active location, return Tunneling Nameless Thing to the staging area.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Mordor. Orc.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Orc Interceptor gets +1 $ and +1 Û for each resource token on it.
Forced: After a location leaves play as an explored location, place a resource token on Orc Interceptor.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Emyn Muil.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After a character commits to the quest, deal 1 damage to that character if it has not been dealt damage by another copy of Brambles and Thorns this round.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Emyn Muil.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Sarn Gebir Rapids is the active location, the "when revealed" effects of Hazard cards cannot be canceled.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Each player must either increase his threat by 5, or reveal an additional encounter card from the encounter deck and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +X Û. X is the $ of the active location.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Doomed 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Remove all progress from each Emyn Muil location in play. Each Eymn Muil location gets +2 $ until the end of the round.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Remove all progress from each Emyn Muil location in play.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Surge. Doomed 2.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Shuffle all Hazard cards in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Shuffle all Hazard cards in the encounter discard pile back into the encounter deck. Then, deal another shadow card for this attack.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Hills of Emyn Muil - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard a random Emyn Muil location from the victory display.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Dead Marshes - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: The Quest Deck has been modified for Nightmare Mode. Flip this card over and keep it next to the quest deck. Its effect remains active throughout the game, which is now ready to begin.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Dead Marshes - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Players cannot reduce their threat.
Setup: Search the encounter deck for The Mere of Dead Faces, and add it to the staging area. Then shuffle the encounter deck.
Forced: After Gollum is placed in the discard pile, shuffle him into the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Dead Marshes - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dead Marshes.

property.name: Text
property.value:
X is the number of resource tokens here. Cannot leave the staging area.
If Gollum is not in play, any resource tokens that would be placed on Gollum are placed here instead.
Forced: After Gollum enters play, place 2 resource tokens on Gollum, then move all resource tokens from The Mere of Dead Faces to Gollum.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Dead Marshes - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Dead Marshes.

property.name: Text
property.value:
While Stagnant Quagmire is in play, it adds its Escape value to all escape tests.
Escape: 2

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Perform an escape test, dealing 1 card from the encounter deck. If this test is failed, discard defending character.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Dead Marshes - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After a character commits to an escape test, deal 1 damage to that character.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Attacking enemy gets +1 Û (+2 Û instead if attacking enemy is Undead).

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Dead Marshes - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Undead. Wight.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Marsh-wight engages a player, that player makes an escape test, dealing 3 cards from the encounter deck. If this test is failed, place 2 resource tokens on Gollum and Marsh-wight make an immediate attack.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Dead Marshes - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spirit. Undead.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After Lost Soul of Lórien is destroyed, attach it to a hero with 1 or more Ò, if able. (Counts as a condition attachment with the text: "Limit 1 per hero. Attached hero's Ò is reduced to 0.")

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Dead Marshes - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Spirit. Undead.

property.name: Text
property.value: While Ill-fated Guard is engaged with a player, that player cannot commit more than 1 character to each escape test.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard all attachments from each characater you control with 3 or more Ò.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Dead Marshes - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: Each player makes an escape test, dealing 1 card from the encounter deck. Each player who fails this test must either discard a hero he controls from play or raise his threat by 5.
Escape: 5

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Dead Marshes - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: The first player makes an escape test counting Ú instead of Ò, dealing 2 cards from the encounter deck. If this test is failed, place 1 resource token on Gollum and deal 1 damage to each character in play.
Escape: 3

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: The Dead Marshes - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
When Revealed: Return the top X Undead enemies in the encounter discard pile to the staging area, where X is the number of players. If no enemies were returned to the staging area as a result of this effect, Devilry of the Dark Land gains surge.
Escape: 10

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: The Quest Deck has been modified for Nightmare Mode. Flip this card over and keep it next to the quest deck. Its effect remains active throughout the game, which is now ready to begin.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
You are playing Nightmare mode.
Forced: At the beginning of the quest phase, the player who is guarding Gollum must either exhaust a hero he controls or resolve the "when revealed" effect of the topmost Tantrum card in the encounter discard pile.
Forced: When Stage 4A is revealed, search the encounter deck and discard pile for 1 copy of Attercop, Attercop and add it to the staging area, if able. Shuffle the encounter deck.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Mordor. Orc.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Ambushing Orcs is dealt a shadow card that targets the player guarding Gollum, that shadow card also targets each other player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Goblin. Orc.

property.name: Keywords
property.value: Cannot be optionally engaged.

property.name: Text
property.value: Forced: After the player guarding Gollum changes, Pursuing Warg-rider engages the player Guarding Gollum and makes an immediate attack against that player.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood - Nightmare

property.name: Traits
property.value: Creature. Spider.

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The player guarding Gollum must either exhaust a hero he controls, or Web-spinner gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: the player guarding Gollum must exhaust a character he controls.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value:
Progress cannot be placed on Deceptive Path while it is in the staging area.
Forced: After Deceptive Path becomes the active location, shuffle the encounter discard pile into the encounter deck and discard cards from the top of the encounter deck until a location is discarded. Reveal that location and make it the active location. Then, discard Deceptive Path.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Reveal the topmost Spider enemy in the encounter discard pile and add it to the staging area.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: The player guarding Gollum must discard all resources from each of his heroes' resource pools.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Attach Isolation to the current quest. (Counts as a Condition attachment with the text: "All characters lose the ranged and sentinel keywords. The player guarding Gollum cannot choose a new player to guard Gollum.")

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: Discard all attachments controlled by the player guarding Gollum. Then, remove all cards in that player's discard pile from the game. If no attachments are discarded as a result of this effect, Befouled Equipment gains surge.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Discard all attachments controlled by the player guarding Gollum.

property.name: Encounter Set
property.value: Return to Mirkwood - Nightmare

property.name: Text
property.value: When Revealed: The player guarding Gollum must either reveal the topmost Tantrum card in the encounter discard pile, or reveal 2 additional encounter cards from the encounter deck.

property.name: Shadow
property.value: Shadow: Deal the topmost Tantrum card in the encounter discard pile as a new shadow card for this attack, if able.
